participant_1.background:
I am doing my best to quit smoking, but it is hard.
I'm not comfortable with my hobbies and need to find a way to express myself without hurting anyone.
i like to do my nails.
I order my food on the phone so that I can stay in my pajamas the whole time.
i love robotics.

participant_2.background:
I bump into things because I am too focused on my thoughts.
i like to go fishing.
this season , i will become a playoff quarterback.
My mother is in the hospital and I'm reading 1984 to distract myself from the pain.
I spend my weekends training for triathlons and dreaming about travelling.

content.text: Good to hear! I'm actually pretty stressed out. My mom is in the hospital and I'm not sure how she's going to be.
Oh no, I'm so sorry to hear that. What happened?
She fell and broke her hip and they don't know if she's going to be able to walk again.
Wow, that's really tough. I'm sure she's going to be okay though. She's a strong woman.
So what are you doing to take your mind off things?
I'm trying to focus on my hobbies, but it's hard. I'm not really sure what to do.
Maybe you could try reading a book? I'm reading 1984 right now and it's really good.
I've been meaning to read that! I've heard good things about it.
Yeah, it's really good. It's a little bit depressing, but it's also really thought-provoking.
Maybe I'll check it out. Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! I hope it helps.
